p: Oxidative stress plays a major role on cell dysfunction. As reported by Sies, high concentrations of hydrogen peroxide can lead to oxidative stress and DNA, protein and lipid damage [ 60]. ROS production is associated with important biomolecule and cell damage [ 61]. Medicinal plant ability to prevent oxidative stress may allow a control of metabolic disturbances by reducing cell damage and by limiting the onset of chronic, low-grade inflammation [ 4, 7, 61].
